subject: Incorrect shipping label
description_text:
Hello,


I received an email stating that my order SSN2700 has been shipped.
However, when I attempt to track the package, I am redirected to the FedEx
website where it reports that the shipping label is incorrect.


Could you please verify the shipment details and provide an updated
tracking number? I’ve attached a screenshot of what I see when I try to
track it on FedEx.


Thank you for your assistance.


Best regards

conversations.body_text: Hi Zeke Weaver,     Sorry, this is your correct logistics tracking link. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=GF6678297804272

Thank you for the clarification.

On Wed, Sep 24, 2025 at 3:16 AM service@simsonn.com
